xmlText.p: First Period_1, Pittsburgh, Kessel 22 (Guentzel, Sheahan), 2:11. 2, Pittsburgh, Hagelin 5, 15:50. 3, Washington, Ovechkin 31 (Djoos), 18:10. Penalties_Crosby, PIT, (tripping), 3:32; Stephenson, WSH, (tripping), 19:27.

Second Period_4, Pittsburgh, Hornqvist 16 (Crosby, Malkin), 0:26 (pp). 5, Washington, Orlov 7 (Niskanen, Eller), 3:08. 6, Washington, Kuznetsov 14 (Wilson, Ovechkin), 11:57. Penalties_Wilson, WSH, (roughing), 12:17; Oshie, WSH, (cross checking), 19:40; Letang, PIT, (roughing), 19:40.

Third Period_7, Pittsburgh, Malkin 27 (Maatta, Kessel), 1:01. 8, Washington, Ovechkin 32 (Kuznetsov, Orlov), 1:50. 9, Pittsburgh, Rust 7 (Letang, Sheahan), 6:08 (pp). 10, Pittsburgh, Kessel 23 (Malkin, Hagelin), 7:59. 11, Pittsburgh, Malkin 28 (Crosby, Guentzel), 10:00 (pp). Penalties_Backstrom, WSH, (high sticking), 4:50; Bowey, WSH, (tripping), 9:05; Malkin, PIT, (tripping), 11:44; Hagelin, PIT, (hooking), 17:08.
Goalies_Washington, Grubauer 4-6-3 (6 shots-5 saves), Holtby 26-10-2 (33-27). Pittsburgh, Murray 17-12-1 (33-29).
